fulltext: 389ebe92d63711e1a404080027e73ea2a4b6c6e4ac464aa8976d233a6f26790b;2018-11-15T16:39:32Z;corpus;corpus:text;BioLexicon;The BioLexicon is a large-scale, wide-coverage computational lexicon covering the biomedical domain. A large part of the lexicon is concerned with covering biomedical terms and their variants. Entries for domain-specific verbs include syntactic and semantic information. The lexicon includes entries that correspond to biomedical-specific vocabulary, as well as general language words. ;2012-09-04
name: 703f73a2-b895-50f0-8769-a9f80e9d04ca
notes: The BioLexicon is a large-scale, wide-coverage computational lexicon covering the biomedical domain. A large part of the lexicon is concerned with covering biomedical terms and their variants. Entries for domain-specific verbs include syntactic and semantic information. The lexicon includes entries that correspond to biomedical-specific vocabulary, as well as general language words.
title: BioLexicon
